data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Describe the most important thing you do to stay healthy. Who taught you this behavior, and how have they modeled it for you? Why do you think it is important?
data.answer: Participating in physical exercises every day is the most important thing I do to keep healthy. Because being physically active can help me stay strong both mentally and physically. The person who introduced this idea to me was my friend Peter. He has been hitting the gym every single day for almost a decade. As a result, I joined a gym and started to exercise every day. Now I have practised this routine for more than two years because I saw a significant improvement in my overall health.
